participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Determined and optimistic, always striving for excellence.
participant_1.background: My favorite color is yellow. I love Italian food and garlic bread. I am a gold medalist Olympian. Gymnastics is my favorite sport. I work out four hours a day.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Reserved and introspective, often lost in thought about life choices.
participant_2.background: I work at a nursing home. I am overweight and unhappy. My wife left me and took my children. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. I don't believe in God.
